Keywords: Cosmic , Frightful Four , Negative Zone , Ruler , Warrior
Real Name: Blastaar
Special Powers
TARGETING: This character can make range attacks while adjacent to opposing characters. (May target adjacent or non-adjacent opposing characters.)
THE FORCEFUL RULER OF BALUUR: Force Blast, Super Strength.
CONCUSSIVE BLAST: Energy Explosion. When he uses it, the character(s) Blastaar originally targeted are dealt penetrating damage.
CONCUSSIVE BLAST FIGHT: Charge, Running Shot. FREE: Make a close attack.
Trade Blastaar Want Blastaar

Comments
August 15, 2021
BrunoHarm
With his IT, I imagine you are always using running shot. Run in, Shoot them in the face and free close attack. Run Medusa for added shape change, punisher prime for penetrating damage on tokened up characters, I think the frightful four are deceptively good.
May 7, 2021
Goop
Its a fair point but at 150 points you are going to really want to be getting that free attack off every turn. If they aren't basing you then you are going to have to base them. So you are going to be using your charge way more than your running shot. Anyway with the new pulse wave rules he drops quite a bit in value and i dont think he's worth 150.
March 14, 2021
RobEng
@Goop It doesn’t say the free attack has to come first so if you get based by a single fig you have the option to close with knockback and then do a running shot. As for the EE, his special combined with his IT enables him to do penetrating damage and reach adjacents. Even without all of those considerations, the running shot improves your opportunity to get the first strike in.
February 24, 2021
Goop
he has that Free close attack so it seems unlikely you are going to keep him at range. The likely play with him is to just charge in and keep swinging. If he falls to those pulse wave clicks you can really punish them. The runningshot/ee just seems kinda wasted on him.
